Articles.Content:
Hi!

I run KSP on mac, here's a list of all the mods I am currently using:

Chatterer

ExtraplanetaryLaunchpads

JSI

KAS

KWRocketry

ModuleManager (2.5.1)

NavyFish

NearFutureConstruction

NearFutureElectrical

NearFutureProps

NearFuturePropulsion

NearFutureSolar

NearFutureSpacecraft

ProbeControlRoom

ReduceClampSounds (KW add-on)

StationPartsExpansion

UAL002

I recently updated to 0.25, and reinstalled all of my mods. Since then, I've had a strange glitch occur where certain parts would become a transparent combination of purple and green.

Here's a picture of the VAB:

As you can see, only certain parts are affected. It's not just mod or non-mod parts. There seems to be no pattern that I can see. If I try to exit or launch the vessel, the game crashes and I have to quit and restart. This happens around 1/2 of the time I enter the VAB, so the game is basically unplayable.

ExtraplanetaryLaunchpads parts appear black in the selection menu, but green and purple when selected

Edited October 26, 2014 by BobMcBobGuy
Incorrect picture upload

If it happens again, please post the following:

  • Player.log (location in this post)
  • Your system specs, including graphics card and video RAM
  • Your graphics core temperature while running KSP
